Note that \mathcal {F}_ \mathbb {A} ^ \mathrm {f} ( \bar {k}) is the restricted product of the \mathcal {F}_ \ell ( \bar {k}) with respect to the \mathcal {F}_{ \mathbb {Z} _ \ell }( \bar {k}).
